meaning_str.bing:
n. 客户；当事人；委托人；（连接在服务器上的）客户机
网络. 客户端；顾客；用户端

客户；当事人；委托人；（连接在服务器上的）客户机

客户；委托人；顾客；当事人；受助者；受赡养者；病人；受保护者；客户端；客户机

1.en: Q: A grateful client sent me a lovely fruit basket, but by the time it arrived, much of it was spoiled.
1.cn: 问：一位心怀感激的客户送给我一个可爱的果篮，但当我收到时，大多数水果都已坏了。

2.en: Discuss the purpose of each medication and its action with client. Allow client to ask any questions about drugs.
2.cn: 与病人讨论每种药品的用药目的及其作用。允许病人询问药品相关问题。

3.en: The implication was that there was no meaningful shortfall in client funds.
3.cn: 言下之意是客户资金不存在真正意义上的亏空。

0.en: Ah, so you found a rich client now?
0.cn: 那你现在找到有钱的客户了吗？

1.en: Good for you, isn't it? Quite a high profile client.
1.cn: 对你是好事吧？好厉害的客户。

2.en: So, you're gonna fight me on every client, every case?
2.cn: 那么，你打算和我争抢每个客户和案子吗？

3.en: Oh, and your client is divorcing our client. No, your client is divorcing ours.
3.cn: 你们的客户正在跟我们的客户闹离婚。错，是你们的客户在跟我们的闹离婚。

4.en: And it defamed your client? How could a robot defame your client?
4.cn: 它诽谤了你的委托人吗？一个机器人怎会诽谤你的客户？

5.en: He was my first client when I became a party planner.
5.cn: 他是我做宴会规划的第一位客户。

6.en: Lionel's a client, and he's a good man. Let him go.
6.cn: 莱奈尔是我的客户，他是个好人，放他走。

7.en: I will, but instead i'm going to fire you as a client.
7.cn: 我会的，不过我要做的是炒掉你这个客户。

8.en: Holy crap. Me. And my $38 million a year in client billing.
8.cn: 我了个去。我，还有我每年三千八百万的客户收入。

9.en: What? You're no longer a client here. I'm not? You're not.
9.cn: 什么？你不再是这里的客户了。我不是吗？你不是了。

10.en: Well, it's unfortunate that my client got in the way of your car's progress.
10.cn: 是太可惜了，我的客户挡了你车的前途。

11.en: Okay. I'll take it. Hey, our first new client. All right. Yes.
11.cn: 好，那我接下来了，我们有第一位新客户了。好极了。

12.en: While still looking out for my client's best interests, of course. Winkwink.
12.cn: 当然同时还要兼顾我客户的利益。你懂的。

13.en: You don't belong here anymore as a client. We'll transfer your files to your home.
13.cn: 你不再是这里的客户了，我们会把你的文件送到你家。

14.en: I did. I already did. You just sent your client to jail for no reason.
14.cn: 我接受了，我已经接受了。你刚凭白无故把你的客户送进了监狱。

15.en: I don't have two days. As a matter of fact, I have to go to a client meeting right now.
15.cn: 我可没两天时间，实际上我现在就要去参加客户会议。

16.en: My life is taken up with client maintenance these days. Why is everybody so unhappy?
16.cn: 最近我老是忙着维护客户关系，为什么每个人都这么不满呢？

17.en: And you went to her with this client's undue attention because you liked her? Yes.
17.cn: 因为你喜欢她，所以在遭受到客户逾矩的关注时你去找了她？是的。

18.en: Lionel, clearly these notes are part of the client files, but they have been redacted.
18.cn: 莱昂内尔，显然这也属于客户的案件卷宗，但是却被他们涂盖了。

19.en: Ross, I have been a divorce attorney for 23 years and never have I had so much business from one client.
19.cn: 罗斯，我当了23年离婚律师，没有一个客户比你捧场。
